description: A skybox for a 3D scene, making it look as if the player was placed within an entire landscape.

resolution.description: Only in "360° picture" mode: The image resolution.

size.description: Only in "360° picture" mode: The size of the projection sphere.

scale.description: Only in "skybox" mode: The scale applied to the projection cube.

blur.description: Only in "skybox" mode: The blur applied to the projected texture between 0 (sharp) and 1 (maximally blurred).
